quotes.t: I made a lot of friends at Les Tourelles with whom I have kept in touch over the years. There was one darling little girl, much younger than the rest of us, who was sweet, {qword}demure{/qword}, and quiet, with beautiful long hair like Alice in Wonderland.

aq.source: {it}I'm Not Making This Up, You Know{/it}

quotes.t: So even if you think you've moved past your reputation as The Rebel, two minutes after getting together with your more {qword}demure{/qword} sister, you're likely to fall back into that hell-raiser role.
It looked as though the dress and capelet were one piece. It created a {qword}demure{/qword} look, but if you take off the capelet, it's a seductive strapless dress.

shortdef: affectedly modest, reserved, or serious : coy
